word_group.brief_definition: 除非另有说明；除非另有规定；除非另有指明
除非另有说明；除非另有声明；除非另行说明

bilingual.source: Hurry up, otherwise we will be late.
bilingual.target: 快点走，否则我们会迟到的。

bilingual.source: Wear a jacket, otherwise you'll catch a cold.
bilingual.target: 穿上夹克，否则你会感冒。

bilingual.source: You should apologize, otherwise she will be upset.
bilingual.target: 你应该道歉，否则她会不高兴。

bilingual.source: We must hurry, otherwise we'll miss the train.
bilingual.target: 我们必须赶快，否则我们会错过火车。

bilingual.source: You must follow the rules, otherwise you will be fined.
bilingual.target: 你必须遵守规则，否则你会被罚款。

bilingual.source: This bicycle needs a repair, otherwise it can't be ridden.
bilingual.target: 这辆自行车需要修理，否则不能骑。

bilingual.source: Save your work frequently, otherwise you might lose it.
bilingual.target: 经常保存你的工作，否则你可能会丢失它。

bilingual.source: Please save your work, otherwise you might lose your data.
bilingual.target: 请保存你的工作，否则你可能会丢失数据。

bilingual.source: You need to dress warmly, otherwise you will catch a cold.
bilingual.target: 你需要穿暖和点，否则你会感冒的。

bilingual.source: You must finish your homework, otherwise you can't go out to play.
bilingual.target: 你必须完成作业，否则你不能出去玩。

list.abstract: otherwise（英[ˈʌðəwaɪz]，美[ˈʌðərwaɪz]），英语单词，作副词用，为不然；否则；在其他方面。作形容词用，为不是那样的；另外情况下的。短语搭配有or otherwise（或者相反），例句为“Otherwise, we'll be here all day.（否则，我们会在这里呆一整天。）” otherwise副词类近义词有else、extra，形容词类近义词有another、elsewise。

yingyinNormal.en: Doing otherwise would be unethical. You have no choice.
yingyinNormal.zh: 否则，就是不道德的，你别无选择。

yingyinNormal.en: There was no witness to the actual murder. Otherwise, he'd be serving a life sentence.
yingyinNormal.zh: 没有目击证人，否则，他就会判终身监禁了。

yingyinNormal.en: Well, this clearly isn't peace. Otherwise, I wouldn't be stuck here with you. Rude.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这显然不算安宁，否则我就不会跟你一起困在这里了。真粗鲁。

yingyinNormal.en: Find yours. Find yours. Learn from each other. Otherwise, we don't stand a chance.
yingyinNormal.zh: 找出你的故事。互相学习。,否则我们就浪费了这次机会。

yingyinNormal.en: Yeah. By tomorrow. Peter needs to endorse tomorrow. Otherwise it looks like he's following the crowd.
yingyinNormal.zh: 好，明天之前，彼得明天就要发表支持了，否则就会像跟风。

yingyinNormal.en: He needs to completely turn over all diplomatic affairs to the State Department. Otherwise, my hands are tied.
yingyinNormal.zh: 他必须把外交事务全部转交给国务院，否则我完全无能为力。

yingyinNormal.en: And it's gotta be something that you're passionate about, because otherwise you won't have the perseverance to see it through.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你们必须为此充满激情，否则的话你们自己也会看不起你们自己。

yingyinNormal.en: Those coffers were never depleted. You simply convinced yourself otherwise to support your own machinations.
yingyinNormal.zh: 他们的精神之库也不曾空过，你只不过说服了你自己，否则就无法继续你的阴谋诡计。

yingyinNormal.en: Because you have a lot of datas(data), because of the datas(data), the manufacturers must do customized things, otherwise manufacturer will be very difficult.
yingyinNormal.zh: 因为我们将有大量的数据，制造商必须个性化，否则他们将非常困难。

yingyinNormal.en: Even when the law is disrespectful? If laws are unjust, there are laws to change them. Otherwise, it's chaos. Which is exactly what we have.
yingyinNormal.zh: 就算法律不值得尊重吗？要是法律不公正，那么会有法律来改变它们！否则一切就都乱套了！现在还不够乱套吗！

yingyinNormal.en: If you're a HeForShe, and I'm assuming that you are because otherwise you'd be in somebody else's press conference right now, I'm here to ask you: What is the impact you can have? How? What? Where? When? And with whom?
yingyinNormal.zh: 如果你是HeForShe的支持者，我假定你们都是了，否则你们现在就在别人的新闻发布会上了，我想要问你的是你能有多大的影响力？以何种方式？何时？何地？与何人一道，产生何种影响？
yingyinNormal.videoNameZh: 《艾玛·沃特森达沃斯世界经济论坛HeForShe演讲》

yingyinNormal.en: Let's not forget that. Otherwise, I'm good.
yingyinNormal.zh: 呃，这个可不能忘，除了这些，都挺好。

yingyinNormal.en: Otherwise, we cannot help you. Or your mother.
yingyinNormal.zh: 除此以外我们没法帮你，还有你母亲。
yingyinNormal.videoNameZh: 《爱丽丝梦游仙境2：镜中奇遇记》

yingyinNormal.en: Otherwise we'd love to. But we can't. Yeah, poor us.
yingyinNormal.zh: 不然我们肯定超想去。可实在没办法。我们运气太不好了。

yingyinNormal.en: Otherwise known as… Yeah, yeah. The Angel of Verdun.
yingyinNormal.zh: 大家都叫她... 对凡尔登的天使。

yingyinNormal.en: Yeah. Otherwise someone might get what they actually ordered.
yingyinNormal.zh: 是啊，那么有人就会拿错他们点的东西了。

yingyinNormal.en: Caroline, needing your friends isn't a weakness, momentary or otherwise.
yingyinNormal.zh: 卡罗琳，需要朋友不叫心软，不管是不是一时的。

yingyinNormal.en: Well, he laughs at his own jokes, but otherwise he's okay.
yingyinNormal.zh: 他除了会说完笑话自己笑之外，其他方面还算不错啦。

yingyinNormal.en: I mean, otherwise, what's the point? Maybe there is no point.
yingyinNormal.zh: 不然的话，还有什么意义呢？也许本来就没意义。

yingyinNormal.en: If he felt so strongly, he should've have advised you otherwise.
yingyinNormal.zh: 如果他这么反对，他就应该劝阻你。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adv. 不然；否则；在其他方面；除此之外；别样；以另外方式；或；另外

word_family.mean: v. 将……看作异类；以异类对待

sense_info_list.en: in circumstances different from those present or considered; or else

examination_example.sentence: You can have AI go out and look for relevant sources and information that <highlight>otherwise</highlight> you just wouldn't have time for.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你可以让人工智能去寻找相关的资源和信息，否则你就没有时间去做了。

examination_example.sentence: Failure can also teach us things about ourselves that we would never have learned <highlight>otherwise</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 失败也可以让我们学到关于自己的东西，否则我们永远也学不到。

examination_example.sentence: Carbon in woody material removed from the forests is burned as biofuel in vehicles that would <highlight>otherwise</highlight> run on fossil fuels.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 从森林中取出的木质材料中的碳被作为生物燃料在车辆中燃烧，不然车辆将使用化石燃料。

sense_info_list.en: in a different way, as an alternative

examination_example.sentence: The cost of travelling by train rises, imposing a burden on those who use the rail network to get to work or <highlight>otherwise</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 乘坐火车的成本上升，给那些使用铁路网络上班及做其他事的人带来了负担。

examination_example.sentence: In effect, the White House claimed that it could invalidate any <highlight>otherwise</highlight> legitimate state law that it disagrees with.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 实际上，白宫声称，它可以废除任何一项合法的州级法律，只要它不认可。

sample.mean: adv. 同样；以相似的方式

表副词, 方向, 状态

word_usage.usage:
otherwise作连词，意为“否则；不然”，相当于or/if not。例：
We'll go early, otherwise we may not get a seat.
我们得早点去，要不然就没有座位了.

otherwise作副词，意为“用别的方法；不同地；在其他方面；除此之外”，相当于in another way或apart from that。例：
He is rich, but otherwise an unhappy man.
他有钱，但在其他方面是个不幸福的人。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Otherwise</highlight> the papers were categorized as psychology.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 否则，这些论文被归类为心理学。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Otherwise</highlight>, the work becomes religion or faith.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 否则，工作成果就会变成宗教或信仰。

sense_info_list.en: in a different way, as an alternative

examination_example.sentence: Young people might not <highlight>otherwise</highlight> be able to afford to break into the business.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 年轻人可能无法负担得起开展业务。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

sense_info_list.en: in circumstances different from those present or considered; or else

examination_example.sentence: When we were asleep we had to contain them in a large room, <highlight>otherwise</highlight> they'd get up to mischief.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当我们睡着的时候，我们必须把他们关在一个大房间里，否则他们会起恶作剧。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Otherwise</highlight>, the recreation of traditions would be artificial and empty.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 否则，对传统的再创造将是虚假的而又空洞的。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adv. 不然；否则；在其他方面；除此之外；别样；以另外方式；或；另外

word_family.mean: v. 将……看作异类；以异类对待

sense_info_list.en: in circumstances different from those present or considered; or else

examination_example.sentence: The school provides free education for girls who would <highlight>otherwise</highlight> have, been unable to continue their studies after completing their nine years of education.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 学校为那些女孩提供免费教育，否则她们在完成九年教育后将无法继续学业。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Otherwise</highlight> I would never become a singer and a professor of music.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 否则，我永远不会成为一名歌手和一位音乐教授。

sense_info_list.en: in a different way to the way mentioned; differently

examination_example.sentence: I thought <highlight>otherwise</highlight> but I might be wrong, let’s look at the facts.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我不这么认为，但我可能错了，让我们看看事实。
